name: Convic - 1st & last ALPHA
description:
Conviс - is a game that is a cross between a typical Top Down and Runner, with Arcade elements and a lot of Action.

In the entourage of the Secret Science Laboratory, in which experiments are carried out on poor fellows with anomalous abilities in the Test Rooms, in which they must run away from Killing Devices, crystallized Zombies, collective farm Turrets and sizzling fire

In the first and last ALPHA of Convic, on which we are completing development on him (C), the NesteSTAT team.
